website_summaries.verdict: The fiberglass handle will take a lot of pounding with no signs of wear. The dual-faced head is sturdy enough for working with different materials, and durable enough to last.
pros: This model includes the popular dual material head, with a black face for heavier jobs and a white face for avoiding black marks
The fiberglass handle offers enough strength to take a frequent pounding without breaking
cons: Complaints about this mallet center on its color
If it is being bought for a husband or as a gift, be sure the receiver is someone who won't mind using a pink tool

customer_reviews.title: Grateful!
customer_reviews.text: I have found that pink tools tend to be low quality, it’s like the makers think that, since we’re women, it won’t matter if it’s durable. Bought this to replace a tape that was a piece of k-rap and I couldn’t be more pleased. Thank you for offering a quality product in pink!
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: I really wasn’t expecting the horrible stench of poorly cured rubber
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly functional so far. But given the brand and the reviews, I really wasn’t expecting the horrible stench of poorly cured rubber. At least it’s NOT so bad that it’s hard to wash the smell off my hands (which I once got from a different company). I guess I got one from a bad batch? Or one that was stored or shipped at to high a temperature? It’s hard to know.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen123

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these screwdrivers. They are bright pink like the pictures. And they have black tips for what reason I do not know. Lol but it seems to help stay on the screw. I am always dropping screws but these screwdrivers help keep the screw in place if that makes sense. This is coming from a single mom learning to do everything on her own.
customer_reviews.author: MallyDG

customer_reviews.title: Color makes it easy to find
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure is sturdy and has lots of useful measurements - more than many standard tape measures. This tape measure has been used for multiple projects already and I am happy with my purchase. The color makes it easy to spot in the midst of other construction tools which is so handy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Push button Retracting tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed!! The others that you have to push the button down to lock it in place always break!! This one works just the opposite it stays in place when extended and retracts when you push the button!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Griggs

customer_reviews.title: It's pink!
customer_reviews.text: So much more affordable than Leatherman and I don't have to worry about the guys stealing it! Now to find a case for it to store in my tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tools
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed these while they're still available since Pinkbox Tools are becoming hard to find. We have several of their tools that we like alot and these didn't disappoint. They're decent quality for the cost and my wife loves the bright pink. It's not necessary but makes it super easy for her to identify her tools when there are several others working on the same project.
customer_reviews.author: Handi-man

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my tools separate!
customer_reviews.text: Like these very much, with the 'pink' in them, my husband can't swipe and hide them. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen King

customer_reviews.title: Shows fractions!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get pink so people would stop stealing my tape measure, this does the trick. Plus it has huge numbers and fractions which help me so much more than I realize.....excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Soozett

customer_reviews.title: Pink! Mine and my husband won't try to claim it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Works as intended and super sturdy. But, the best part is that it's pink and my husband can't steal it to use, then pretend it's his. This is a great gift for anyone that wants their DIY stuff to be noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia - So. California

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a normal tape from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this since August of 2019. I used it very little. I went to go use it today and the “retract” button does not work. So I can’t get tape back in. So now it’s as good as trash. I bought it because it’s pink and hoped it would be less likely to get misplaced... turns out the issue is it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jepson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty hard core for pink tools. I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cauthon

customer_reviews.title: pink metric
customer_reviews.text: perfect for wife that can only read and understand metrics.
customer_reviews.author: krazyvyrus

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because it was so much cheaper than other tools like it that weren’t pink. Great quality and he loved it once I explained the pink. It is truly well made and great. I want to buy more of this line.
customer_reviews.author: Dee....

customer_reviews.title: ladies
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, you will know who has yours by the very color of it.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Y.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: So, I actually got this because it’s pink and I like to have all my tools easily identifiable. However, this is not my favorite. It’s not as easy to read as others I’ve had. Maybe I should just paint one myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those little picture hanging chores
customer_reviews.text: I admit I didn't need the little box of picture hanging items but the pink magnet dish and mini level are worth the package. Perfect for those little picture hanging chores. If you've ever been crawling around on the floor feeling for tiny screws or nails that you dropped you will appreciate the magnetized metal dish. As usual the pick box products are excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: P. Minges

customer_reviews.title: Big head hammer
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know what anyone would want to see a review on a hammer for???? But, the head is big, it is well weighted. I use it for metal smithing and like that it is so much bigger than my similar, much smaller hammer. Nice quality and does the trick. I would not use it on nails tho.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Love screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t need screwdrivers and on top of them being very durable and great quality. I love pink but wasn’t sure if the quality was gonna be there and it is
customer_reviews.author: Flowerchild

customer_reviews.title: Cute ‘n functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought to have my own tape handy. Figure hubs might borrow but def won’t keep bc it’s pink! So far, so good ;) MINE hahahaha!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Koz

customer_reviews.title: Thank u
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me n sis. Comes in handy when needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OPB all day long!
customer_reviews.text: I must own every OPA (original pink box) item out there and they have never let me down. From basic screw drivers to power tools, I'm a lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: AJA

customer_reviews.title: The guys don't steal this one
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work, and this is the only tape measure that the guys don't take. Plus it's extremely handy that it automatically locks when extended, so I can use it solo and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: GoldencatQuill

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tape measure. Being pink I dont have to worry about it being taken at work (none of the guys want a pink tool on their belt) and having standard and metric on the same tape is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Feels very cheap. The handle isn’t even on correctly. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Icstars06

customer_reviews.title: Love my pink tools
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and price. I LOVE that they are pink!
customer_reviews.author: MidGaPeach

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was actually great, but a little heavy. I was buying it for a female friend, and I thought it might be a little lighter. Not a big deal. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: Judy McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Making my life better!
customer_reviews.text: So good looking and makes my fixing and assembling things so much faster and easier to do!
customer_reviews.author: Ojitos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take camping. Perfect size to fit inside my camp box and obviously works for securing stakes. Plus it’s pink!!
customer_reviews.author: destiney sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Pink Box Rubber Mallot
customer_reviews.text: This rubber mallet has come in so handy since I purchased it. Highly recommend and I will buy again when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Durable and very user friendly for anyone who has trouble reading tape measures.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and has the dummy measurements. Which is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The tape measure did not even work the first time. Junk! Had to manually pull out and close. It was difficult.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA D WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Nice mallet for your toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this mallet. Well-balanced and perfect for driving steel pins into landscape fabric. Just the right weight, too. Good for simple or extended jobs. Color makes it easy to spot or ask for its return lol.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: fits right in with the rest of my pink tools. Works well. Sturdy. Not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Paula Brant

customer_reviews.title: heavy
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought a sheath to clip on my pants
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this to install vinyl flooring in my home. This was just the tool that I needed to help get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob P.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: Tape measure bent and was broke within a month skip this one
customer_reviews.author: D1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and high quality! Works great for my job.
customer_reviews.author: Voila

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Great tape measure! I have this in my junk drawer so I always know where it is! Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kish

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set, good magnet to hold onto screws, good sizes AND they are pink of course.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Love the pink!
customer_reviews.text: Love adding to my pink tool collection. The great thing about having pink tools, is that if the men borrow them, they’ll always return them since they don’t want to be caught with pink tools! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice colour
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt lock. Even in lick position, i can pull tape out
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Nice.. feel solid
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than expected. So that means I'll need less of a swing to get the job done. I like the color. Not sure ot the durability at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Savyourdvine1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Great hammer with a nice feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Royall B. Hoffer

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I have all the Original Pink Box items and Love them ! The magnet bowl is so strong you can put any small metal object in it turn it upside down and not lost a thing ! And the Pink level is perfect just what I wanted !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match Pink Apollo Precision Tool kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match my wife's new Apollo Precision Tool Kit (Pink). She loves the kit and hammer. She did not even hit me with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Magnetic tray is awesome and save some real frustration when trying to keep up with little pieces.the level also has a magnetic strip on the bottom which makes it very handy for staying in place on metal surfaces
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Another tool for my pink toolbox. Used it as soon as it arrived on my office chair. Does what it's designed to do!
customer_reviews.author: RetiredAndLovingIt

customer_reviews.title: Be a man!
customer_reviews.text: I like watching my boyfriend have to use it... and that's why I only by pink tools.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as you'd like
customer_reviews.text: Broke the 2nd time I used it and because of the window of time - I cant return it
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hammering my snaps into fabric. Would recommend to anyone needing a stylish mallet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rubber mallet! I love to do little projects around the house and this works great for so many things! and its PINK! who doesn't love pink!
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little level and magnetic holding tray! Well made, my wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: FxMerc

customer_reviews.title: good quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Part of the all pink tool set I bought my daughter for Christmas, now that she is a homeowner; good quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: HALODOC

customer_reviews.title: Pink:-)
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight to handle, feels good in my hand. And I can find it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best Mallet Ever....and impeccable service........
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I have my own mallet, and, due to my declining eyesight, it's easy to find in my toolbox!!! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beat the hell out of some pavers. Held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D

customer_reviews.title: Great mallet. Hopefully Pink Box Tools will make more tools with a greater variety.
customer_reviews.text: Great mallet. Hopefully Pink Box Tools will make more tools with a greater variety.
customer_reviews.author: Papa TTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: id buy it again
customer_reviews.text: too cool and usefull, i love pink products for real working women.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Behan

customer_reviews.title: it's a hammer
customer_reviews.text: I guess its great, i haven't used it much because its smaller and prettier than my other rubber hammer.
customer_reviews.author: emily from NZ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job great. I'm using it for putting 6" staples in ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job great. I'm using it for putting 6" staples in a hillside to hold onto jute netting for light erosion control. Seems really durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Arrived with oder
customer_reviews.text: The Orginal Pink Box Rubber Mallet is as expected -- it's a mallet. Does have a chemical/plastic-like oder that I am hoping will go away. If not, I will revise my review. Did take away one star for the Oder it arrived with as I am sensitive to scents. I didn't think of the actual name of the company until I said it out loud to a male when it arrived. I wanted it pink so there would be no doubt I bought it, and it is!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mallet!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Rubber Mallet! My wife loves it! I ordered her the $700 Pink Box for Valentines Day, and then decided to buy one of everything from the entire Pink Box Catalog to fill the toolbox up, and she still has room for more!
customer_reviews.author: FxMerc

customer_reviews.title: Love pink
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it looks great, feels great and if anything goes wrong I'll let you know. Love the pink though
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Pink & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece... Another great accessory to my already building pink tools.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not used but I feel it will work as expected
customer_reviews.author: Edith W

customer_reviews.title: A nail holds the head to the body.
customer_reviews.text: A nail holds the head to the body - garbage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stef

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: As a slot technician in a casino, I use these tools everyday. There’s no mistaking that they’re mine because they’re pink. I love pink - and glitter, so I added a bit of glitter nail polish to them. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in pink
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy tape measure and perfect in pink so no one accidentally walks off with it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

product_meta.title: The Original Pink Box PB20HM Rip Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Holder, 20 oz, Pink
product_meta.description: Style:20oz Rip Hammer20 ounce head with a rip claw. The durable fiberglass core reduces vibrations better than steel handles. Magnetic nail holder assists in setting and driving nails.
feature_bullets: You'll always know which hammer is yours with this unique coloring
Easy grip handle adds comfort and style
Fiberglass core handle with resin coating

specifications.Included Components: Rip Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Holder, 20 oz., Pink
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars382 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
